page.title: 07Whiteley Village-other facts
page.content: Other buildings in the village include 3 churches, a hospital and offices. A few people do not like the village and leave after a few weeks, but most stay there for the rest of their retirement. They do not have to be retired shop workers any more. Anyone can apply to live there as long as they are fit and healthy on arrival. One rule is that residents can only leave the village for a few days each year, so that no-one can use their cottage like a holiday home. Now that more residents have cars there is a plan to build some garages. The old air-raid shelters are used by many people as garden sheds. The old people really enjoyed talking to us. They gave us sweets and oranges, and told us that we were very well behaved and to come again to see them.
